page.title: 06RAINBOW-CLOWN
page.content: RAINBOW_CLOWN _____________ One day two people came to perform a play for our school.It was called "RAINBOW THE CLOWN".The clown had a friend called Jamie,who was very poor.Jamie wanted to be a clown in the circus.Rainbow showed Jamie a trick or two.Jamie showed the ringmaster the trick but the man said it was not good enough.Jamie went back day after day after day until the man said "o.k you may join the circus,but you must work very hard". It was a very good play and was performed by the NORTHERN AND SCOTTISH DRAMA COMPANY.They visit our school once a year to perform.A WELSH DRAMA COMPANY visits the school once a term and we are allowed to act with them. Written by Corrina Zarach aged 9.
